Key: Ah.
Today is one fine day.

(The weather was nice where I stood in front of Tengu
Station. This was where we were going to meet up.)
We were supposed to meet at Pachiko, right?

(I looked around the area before spotting Kurumi. She
seemed cheerful as she looked around herself.)
Oh, there she is. Heeey, Kurumi!

(Kurumi noticed me and smiled. She waved as I made my
way toward her.)
Sorry, I thought I was on time... Did I make you wait?
No. I just got here a little while ago.
I see. I'm glad.

(I feel like I've had this interaction before. That's
right―I'm on another date with Kurumi today.)
Um...
...What's the matter?
Oh, nothing!
Oh, are you thinking about my swimsuit?
...Huh?

Hehehe. Don't worry. I did bring the swimsuit you
chose for me the other day.
Th-That's not it!

Shido-san, I can't believe you would choose such a
swimsuit... I certainly underestimated you.
Huh?! I chose a normal swimsuit, right?! Right?!
Of course. I was only kidding.
I-I thought so.

(Kurumi giggled. It seems like she's been playing with
me from the get-go.)
Gosh, give me a break...
I'm sorry. I didn't mean anything by it.
Well, I guess I'm not too bothered.
So, Shido-san. Please lead the way.
Got it. Let's go, Kurumi.

(I took Kurumi's hand. She graciously followed after
me, and that made me a little happy.)
Hehe. I can't wait to go to Ocean Park.

(Ocean Park was a water park that we decided to visit
a long time ago. Kurumi and I walked together toward
Tengu Station.)

(I got out of the locker room and looked for Kurumi.
It seemed like she was still changing.)
Kurumi's not out yet...
Anyways, time to go over the plan!

(I've been to Ocean Park before. Today, I'm going to
use the experience I have to show Kurumi a good time.)
Kurumi usually leads the way...

I-I'm first going to take her hand and bring her to
the pool.

I-I'm her boyfriend... so I can at least hold her
hand, right?
All right, I'm going to impress her today!
(Or so I thought...)
...Um, what am I supposed to do in this situation?
Shido-san, take this.
Th-This?

(Kurumi handed me a bottle of sunscreen. Th-This
means...)
U-Um, Kurumi-san?
What do you want me... to do with this sunscreen?
It's obvious. You're going to put this on me, right?
What...?!

I mean, there are hard-to-reach areas. I'd love my
boyfriend to put it on me...
Well, but... Touching your skin directly...

Shido-san. I won't be embarrassed, no matter where
you touch me.
...Okay.
Come on, pre-tty please...
Do as she asks and put sunscreen on her
Might as well have her undo the top part

(I succumbed to the temptation of Kurumi's smooth,
porcelain skin... And took the sunscreen from her.)
...I'm glad you're willing.
Please start with my back.
O-Okay.
Hehe. Something the matter?
N-No, nothing at all!
Then, if you would please.
G-Got it.

(Kurumi's fair skin was extremely bright. Seeing her
like this, I felt all levels of self-restraint leave
me.)

(I tried as much as possible not to look at her body
as I rubbed the sunscreen on her.)
L-Like this?
Whoa. S-Sorry! Did I touch someplace weird?
No. It felt so good...
Shido-san. Please go lower.
O-Okay.
Mmmm.
Auuuu.
AHHHH.

(Every time I put my fingers on her, deep sighs
escaped her mouth.)
Kurumi... Um, are you okay?
Yes. You're very good, Shido-san.
Don't mind me. Please continue.
(But it makes me feel weird...)
Next... Please work from my hips to my legs.
Wh-What?! I'm going to do those areas, too?
...You don't want to?
Well, that's not it, but―!

(B-But as a healthy male, any more than this will be
painful..)
Don't be shy... Please continue.
Now... Shido-san.
*whimper*...

(I ended up rubbing all of the sunscreen on her until
the end, just as she requested.)

(I didn't want to just do everything she asked, so I
decided to trouble her a little.)
...Okay, fine. I'll put it on you.
...I'm glad you're willing.
Could you please start from my back?

Th-That's fine with me, but won't the swimsuit strings
be in the way?
...What?

I-I might as well put it on evenly, right? Then you
need to undo the back―
...I see.

(Kurumi gave me a bewitching stare, and I came back
down to earth. I guess I went too far.)
Oh, Kurumi. I was only kidd―
Okay, then.
...What?!
Hold on a moment.
K-Kurumi?!
Hehe... I'm getting ready right now.

(Kurumi reached back to undo the top of her swimsuit,
revealing her pale skin in its entirety.)
Now... Shido-san, if you would please.
O-Okay...

(Seeing Kurumi's alluring back, I couldn't help but
gulp.)

Hehehe... I get to feel your hands on me. I must be
really lucky.

(I can't back down now. I put the sunscreen on her and
began to spread it across her back.)
Mmm... Haaah.
You're really good, Shido-san... Please continue.
O-Okay...
Uummm.
Mmmmm.
HAAAAAH...

(Every time I moved my hands, Kurumi's body jolted
and quivered, and she made noises that boiled all the
liquid from my head.)
My... What's the matter, Shido-san?
You're making too many noises...!
Well, that's because you're touching me in that way.
I-It's my fault...?

That's right. It's because your hands feel so nice.
Please continue... until you're finished.

If that's not enough for you... Then after you've
finished on my back, maybe you can work on my
front?
What...
N-No. Give me a break!
(I don't think I'll be able to restrain myself...)

That's unfortunate. Where's the Shido-san who said
he wanted to enjoy Kurumi's skin more...
I NEVER SAID THAT! NOT A SINGLE WORD!

Hehe... Very well. I guess I'll just take the front,
then.
Oh I see... Hey wait! That's wrong! Just the back!

Gosh, Shido-san. You're such a shy boy... So...
Please take care of the rest.
O-Okay...
(In the end, I put the sunscreen on as she asked.)

(We ended up playing at Ocean Park until the evening
and went home afterwards.)
*sigh*... We did a lot today.

(It was my first time going to the pool with Kurumi.
Despite the sunscreen situation, I feel like I played
too hard.)
(I was so tired when we went to take the bus back.)

(Kurumi and I sat next to one another at the bus stop
in front of the station, waiting for the bus to arrive.)

Oh yeah... Why don't we schedule our next date?
Kurumi, when do you want to go? ...Kurumi?
...Zzz.
...Kurumi?

(Kurumi had closed her eyes and fallen asleep. I
couldn't help but smile because she looked so
adorable. Something I rarely got to see.)
Well, we did move around a lot today...
...Shido-san.
Hm...? What is it, Kurumi?
Mmmm...
She's sleep-talking...
...Forever...
...I want to be with you forever...
(I decided to watch her sleep until the bus came.)

(She had carelessly left her hand out, so I softly
held it in mine.)
